attributes.action: Government explain your position on the New World Order
attributes.additional_details:
The New World Order is a plan for a one world government set out by the Americans, openly promoted by the Bush family and others, this is a plan also set out by Hitler which millions of our soldiers died to prevent.

It is requested that the British government explain its views on this plan and what steps it is taking to prevent such an event from happening again.

We do not want a one world government because it is hard enough to contact this one and we have issues in Britain that would be made a million times worse under a one world government.

It is therefore requested that the government show solidarity on this issue as it is not something that is going to go away and will cause more bloodshed in the future if such an event was to take place.
